description:
Bump up the feature set of your zipper-pull with the Outsider 4-in-1 survival multitool.

  • Thermometer reads in Fahrenheit and Celsius scales down to -20º F and -30º C
  • Compact, glowing compass – metal parts can be detached for more accurate compass readings
  • Fire steel and striker are safely tucked away until you need them
  • Whistle for signalling
  • Compact design can be a keyring or a zipper-pull
name: Sun Company Outsider Zipper Pull with 4 Outdoor Essential Tools
